pullRequest.body:
Let `(Sᵢ)_{i : I}` be a family of finite sets indexed by a cofiltered category `I` and let `S` be
its limit in `Profinite`. Let `G` be a functor from `Profinite` to a category `C` and suppose that
`G` preserves the limit described above. Suppose further that the projection maps `S ⟶ Sᵢ` are
epimorphic for all `i`. Then `G.obj S` is isomorphic to a limit indexed by
`StructuredArrow S toProfinite` (see `Profinite.Extend.isLimitCone`).

We also provide the dual result for a functor of the form `G : Profiniteᵒᵖ ⥤ C`.

---

(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

### PR summary [2460397ecb](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/14382/commits/2460397ecb6000779d1b0a0ba21b9367b8dc2b5e)

#### Import changes for modified files

No significant changes to the import graph


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|
| `Mathlib.Topology.Category.Profinite.Extend`|1351|
| `Mathlib.Topology.Category.LightProfinite.Extend`|1359|

</details>

---

<details><summary>

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`+ exists_hom`
`+ instance (i : DiscreteQuotient S) : Epi (S.asLimitCone.π.app i)`
`+ instance (i : ℕᵒᵖ) : Epi (S.asLimitCone.π.app i)`
`+ instance : lightToProfinite.PreservesEpimorphisms`
`++ asLimit'`
`++ asLimitCone'`
`++ cocone`
`++ cone`
`++ diagram'`
`++ fintypeDiagram'`
`++ functor`
`++ functorOp`
`++ functorOp_final`
`++ functor_initial`
`++ isColimitCocone`
`++ isLimitCone`
`++ lim'`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

</details>

> I assume you're preparing to relate `Profinite.extend` and friends to Kan extensions?

Yes, see #15566, specifcally https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/blob/f7f43971b46ef2041f517cdd1c4d9440158a9dde/Mathlib/Condensed/Discrete/Colimit.lean

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10647951305/job/29516473896)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10647951305/job/29516474062)
Looks good! I had a few suggestions which are fairly minor. I assume you're preparing to relate `Profinite.extend` and friends to Kan extensions?
Looks good! I had a few suggestions which are fairly minor. I assume you're preparing to relate `Profinite.extend` and friends to Kan extensions?

I think this is also true with the weaker assumption that for all i there exists a j mapping to i such that `c.pi.app j` is epi, right? The way you stated it is the right way to do it from the point of view of the typeclass system, but we may want to think later about how to formulate such weaker assumptions.
I guess so. I'll add a TODO in the docstring

I think it would be better for this diagram to have type `StructuredArrow S toProfinite ⥤ FintypeCat`, and work with the composition with `toProfinite` when you need the diagram to take values in `Profinite`.

I was trying to make the naming consistent with `Profinite.diagram` from the `asLimit` file. There we have `Profinite.fintypeDiagram` taking values in `FintypeCat` and `Profinite.diagram` its postcomposition with `toProfinite`. Here, the `Profinite.fintypeDiagram'` would just be `StructuredArrow.proj _ _` so I didn't feel that it deserved a special name. But I can add it as another `abbrev`.
Similarly here... I think this should take values in `FintypeCat`.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(Topology/Profinite): extending cones in `Profinite` and `LightProfinite`
